nodes.text: Circle Culu was a group of Jedi Seers during the Mandalorian Wars, aligned with the Jedi Covenant. They were likely named after Miraluka Jedi Knight Shoaneb Culu.

In 3963 BBY, Haazen claimed that Krynda Draay was meditating with Circle Culu in the upper levels of the Draay Estate. All members of the Circle were either killed or arrested after Operation: Vindication.
